word.label: Full Analysis
word.prompt: Provide a comprehensive analysis for the word '{text}' in {from_language}. Include its definition, synonyms, antonyms, and three example sentences.

phrase.label: Proofread
phrase.prompt: Proofread and correct the following text, keeping the original meaning. Explain the corrections. The original text is in {from_language}. Use Markdown for your corrections: **new text** for additions and ~~old text~~ for deletions. Original text: '{text}'

phrase.label: Translate
phrase.prompt: Translate the following text from {from_language} to {to_language}. Text: '{text}'
